topic.title: Assign Porosity and Longitudinal Dispersivity and in GWT Model

para.text: Assign Porosity and Longitudinal Dispersivity and in GWT Model
The model has a longitudinal dispersivity of 20 and a porosity of 0.3. These can be set in the
dialog box. Select "Edit|Edit Data Sets" to display it.

The horizontal and vertical dispersivity and diffusion coefficient are specified by layer in the MODFLOW Layer Groups dialog box. However, the default values for those variables match the variables used in this model so it is not necessary to change them.
